name: torrent-player
description: Video player for popular torrent trackers

scripts.start: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && electron ./electron --proxy-region=cz
scripts.start:web: concurrently -n "SERVER,WEBPACK" -c "black.bold,blue.bold" "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.start:server: cd client && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn start
scripts.debug: concurrently -n "SERVER,ELECTRON,WEBPACK" -c "black.bold,white,blue.bold" "cd server && yarn start" "electron ./electron --debug" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.debug:proxy: concurrently -n "SERVER,ELECTRON,WEBPACK" -c "black.bold,white,blue.bold" "cd server && yarn start:proxy" "electron ./electron --debug" "cd client && yarn start"
